title: Moonfall
alt: Novel ideas and cool explosions are both good, but what I really want from a movie is novel ideas ABOUT cool explosions.
transcript:
[Cueball and Megan walking to the right]]
Megan: Are you excited for Moonfall?
Megan: Or cringing?
Cueball: Well...[Closeup on Cueball]]
Cueball: I like when stories are grounded in good science because it's exciting to expand our ideas of what's possible.[Zoomed back out to Cueball and Megan walking to the right. Cueball has his palms raised]
Cueball: But I also support giving Roland Emmerich as much money as he wants to make cool spaceship noises and smash moons into things.
Megan: Excited to expand our ideas of how much stuff can explode at once.
